title: (x) Trapper Keeper logo - Motter Tektura {Simon Heptonstall}
content:
Children of the 80s unite!

Can anybody identify the typeface used for the "Trapper Keeper" wordmark?
author: mister_eaves

comments.content:
Oops, forgot to attach some images.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229204221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trapper_4478.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229204221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/f755_3_5458.JPG.jpg)
Hahaha oh man. Trapper Keeper was the best.

Didn't actually know the name but found info here:

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typography\_of\_Apple\_Inc.#Motter\_Tektura](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229204221/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typography_of_Apple_Inc.#Motter_Tektura "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typography\_of\_Apple\_Inc.#Motter\_Tektura")

Paratype has some [digitized version](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229204221/http:/www.paratype.com/asearch/default.asp?search=tektura&params=1&x=0&y=0) and abstractfonts has one called Mottek (revealed by Mike F.)

@ MODS: Please feel free if you like to remove one or two of these links. I for my life can't say if they are legit or not.
I removed the second link -- the website didn't exactly look kosher.
